title: How to Make Thai Sausage Salad

steps.headline: Combine the dressing ingredients in a small bowl and set aside.
Peel and slice the cucumbers thinly.
steps.description: Add them and the bean sprouts in a large bowl.

steps.headline: Slice the sausages thinly diagonally.
steps.description: Sauté them for about five minutes over medium heat until the edges are light brown. Allow them to cool before adding them to the large bowl.

steps.headline: Pour the dressing over the sausage mixture and toss lightly.
Serve the salad.
steps.description: Plate a serving over jasmine rice and garnish it with the parsley or cilantro, and chili.

text: Combine the dressing ingredients in a small bowl and set aside.  Peel and slice the cucumbers thinly. Add them and the bean sprouts in a large bowl. Slice the sausages thinly diagonally. Sauté them for about five minutes over medium heat until the edges are light brown. Allow them to cool before adding them to the large bowl. Pour the dressing over the sausage mixture and toss lightly.  Serve the salad. Plate a serving over jasmine rice and garnish it with the parsley or cilantro, and chili.
